EmailTemplate.subject: Why do customers upgrade to Laseref IV?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Since we haven’t had the chance to connect, I thought I’d share some feedback we’ve received from our customers on why they upgraded to Laseref IV:
- Improved cost of maintenance with a modular design and assembly - MTBF (Mean Time Between Failures) consistently exceeds 40,000 hours - MTBUR (Mean Time Between Unscheduled Removals) more than 20,000 hours since service entry in 1997 - 25 pounds lighter than LASEREF II and 10 pounds lighter than LASEREF III - 30 percent improvement in demonstrated reliability
If you have any questions about what I just shared, please feel free to connect with me directly. I’m here to help.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Sincerely,
{{lead.ABM Sales Rep:default=Perry Pelitera}}
